alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 2:18PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yalobusha and eastern Tallahatchie Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paynes, or 10 miles southwest of Charleston, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Water Valley, Charleston, George Payne State Park, Enid, Paynes, Oakland, Distall, Leverett, Tippo, Effie and Tillatoba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
